analysis: The project currently has a basic HTML structure with incomplete CSS and JavaScript files. The theme should focus on black holes with animated objects and slides. The existing files need enhancements to create a cohesive cosmic theme with interactive elements.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with a dark cosmic theme, including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements to enhance the black hole topic.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon and ensure all sections are properly included, such as interactive planets and animated slides related to black holes.
Fix syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented, including event listeners for new buttons.
